snippet: Senator Mitch McConnell will retain his campaign manager, Jesse Benton, even though Mr. Benton acknowledged saying he was only working on the campaign to help a Rand Paul presidential bid.
abstract: Senator Mitch McConnell will retain his campaign manager, Jesse Benton, even though Mr. Benton acknowledged saying he was only working on the campaign to help a Rand Paul presidential bid.

headline.main: Top McConnell Aide 'Holding My Nose' to Help Rand Paul
